participant_1.background:
I am a well-educated person who enjoys bowling and music.
i like to hunt for my food.
I'm taking my child to the zoo to see koalas.
I binge watch shows on streaming services to escape my unsatisfying relationship.
My laundry takes a backseat to my many projects.

participant_2.background:
I took a long break and reevaluated my priorities.
Every day is a sweet taco-filled adventure.
i have a little sister.
my favorite singer is jess greenberg.
i work as a english teacher.

content.text: It is going great!  I am taking my son to the zoo to see koalas today.
That sounds like a fun outing! I love animals.  I'm a teacher and I recently took a long break to reevaluate my priorities.
What made you take a break?
I was feeling burned out and I needed to spend more time with my family.  I am so glad I did.
I'm glad to hear that.  I need to take a break too.  I have so many projects going on and I am not really enjoying any of them.
You should take some time for yourself.  Do something you enjoy and relax.
I think I will.  Thanks for the advice!  What is your favorite thing to do for fun?
I love to listen to music and eat tacos.  My favorite singer is Jess Greenberg.
I love music too!  I listen to music while I work.  I have never heard of Jess Greenberg.  I will have to check her out.
You should!  She is an amazing singer.  I am going to go make some tacos.  I hope you have a great day!
Thanks, you too!  I am going to go get my son ready for the zoo.
